ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] EQ Yeild Rule
ygData.msgSnippet: HI Ziltus, read the play nice policy on verant site. Concerning the Yield rule....... I walk up to a mob. Nuke Nuke NUKE. I rulez...they yield. Muhahhahahha.
ygData.messageBody:
HI Ziltus,

read the "play nice" policy on verant site.

Concerning the Yield rule.......
I walk up to a mob. Nuke Nuke NUKE.
I rulez...they yield.
Muhahhahahha.
j/k

Btw, it eazier to get that divnn dagger off at nek forest and inside
grobb(best).
But since u r doing emperor crush for the doff ring tunic. Divn is there
but its rare drop.

Be well

Bibi aka Yiyang
aka Druid Nukem'


-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, March 24, 2000 11:33 AM
Subject: [sg-everquest] EQ Yeild Rule


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>Hi guys,
>
>Before I leave EQ 6 mths ago, there was a hot debate on the Yield rule.
> Ie, if a high lvl player is hunting a mob for item (and give him no xp), a
>low lvl player come in for xp, the high lvl guy have to leave the place.
> Is tat rule in now?
>
>I got a UO buddy (a she btw, REAL female) who happened to play in Innoruuk.
>She is a one of my best buddies in UO, very trust-worthy, nice and mature
>lady. Now I intend to help her to camp for dvinn dagger and dwarven chain
>tunic (these 2 mobs spawn quite often right?), can I do so? Coz CB tower
>sure crowded with newbies. If I walk in like a newbie (with all my stuffs
>kept in bank), can they use the Yield rule to chase me out? ;)
>
>Thx.
>
>Ziltus
